applications

Class XMLParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • applications.XMLParser

  • public final class XMLParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to parse XML files for configuration details of Apps and return those Apps.
    Author:
    Joe Benassi

      • getPackets

        public static final App[] getPackets(java.io.File[] files)
                              throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                                     org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                     java.io.IOException
        Parses input files for configuration details of Apps and returns those Apps in array form.
        Parameters:
        files - The array of files to parse for configuration details of Apps.
        Returns:
        The array of Apps
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException
        org.xml.sax.SAXException
        java.io.IOException

      • getPacket

        private static final App getPacket(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
            int hotkey,
            int appID)
        Parses the input document for configuration details of an App, and returns the App.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to parse for configuration details of.
        hotkey - The number shown with "Ctrl" in the Menu as a hotkey for the App.
        appID - The unique ID given to the app.
        Returns:
        The App configured by the input parameters.

      • getName

        private static final java.lang.String getName(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Returns the title of the App as displayed in its popup telemetry window.
        Parameters:
        document - The document to parse within to find the name.
        Returns:
        The title of the App as displayed in its telemetry window.

        prefix - The prefix for the App.

      • getTelemetry

        private static final Telemetry[] getTelemetry(org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Returns the telemetry data array as defined in the input Document.
        Parameters:
        document - The Document to parse for configuration details.
        Returns:
        The telemetry data array as defined in the input Document.

      • getParse

        private static final java.lang.String[] getParse(org.w3c.dom.Document document,
                          java.lang.String first,
                          java.lang.String second)
        Helper method; used to parse for second-order XML data. For example, if My App contained a single "telemetrynames" entry, and that "telemetrynames" entry contained an array of "name"'s, you would call getParse(document, "telemetrynames", "name") to return that array of "name"'s;
        Parameters:
        document - The document to parse for configuration details.
        first - The name of the first entry to search.
        second - The name of the data intended to be returned.
        Returns:
        the array of second-order XML data.
